title: I can't gift RP?
body:
I'm trying to gift my mate some RP, but when I try it skips over the "Choose Gift" option and goes straight to "Finalize" where I write the note? So I can't select the amount of RP I want to send. 
- We've been on each other's friends list since Season 3ish.
- He isn't currently banned.
- I'm not over my gift limit as I havent sent a gift in months.

Any ideas?

The best thing I can do is show you the [gifting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ) and see if you two meet the requirements. I noticed there's a few more requirements and restrictions in this doc, so see if you might've missed one. If that fails, you can try filing a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and ask Player Support if they can do the gift for you or fix the issue you're having.
